predictions.article: Secretary Rollins Delivers Remarks at Commodity Classic, Announces Next Steps for Economic Disaster Relief
predictions.prediction: The introduction of the Emergency Commodity Assistance Program (ECAP) and the release of $30 billion in economic and disaster relief will lead to an increase in applications for USDA assistance programs by at least 20% within the next month.

predictions.article: USDA Projects $49 Billion Agricultural Trade Deficit in 2025
predictions.prediction: The projected $49 billion agricultural trade deficit will result in a 5% increase in domestic agricultural product prices within the next two months due to reduced import competition.
